metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11734 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer over-read was found in the function decompileCALLFUNCTION in util/decompile.c in Ming 0.4.8, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
